description.gold-silver:
Restores HP by 1/2
the max HP.
description.crystal:
Restores HP by 1/2
the max HP.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Recovers up to half the
user’s maximum HP.
description.emerald:
Recovers up to half the
user’s maximum HP.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Heals the user by
up to half its full
HP. It can be used
to heal an ally.
description.diamond-pearl:

own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP.
It may also be used
to heal an ally’s HP.
